## getMetadata() function

A promise that resolves with the metadata for this object. If this object doesn't exist or metadata cannot be retreived, the promise is rejected.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function getMetadata(ref: types.StorageReference): Promise<types.Metadata>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  ref | types.StorageReference | StorageReference to get metadata from. |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;types.Metadata&gt;
